history.action: üî¨ PAPER ACADEMIC READINESS VERIFICATION (C428) ‚Äî T-23 sign-off for Mar 7 arXiv draft. Audited all 9 sections: 8/9 academically ready, Evaluation needs metrics refresh (C394‚ÜíC428). Verified: citation consistency, cross-reference mapping, figure/table requirements. Status: CONDITIONAL GO ‚úÖ. Created docs/research/arxiv-paper-academic-readiness-c428.md. Commented #131. Added L171: T-N academic readiness mirrors product launch sign-offs.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Applying the T-N readiness pattern (L166-L168) from product launch to academic milestones creates uniform verification approach across deliverable types. Lesson: Academic papers benefit from same multi-role sign-off discipline as software releases ‚Äî structured verification surfaces gaps early.

history.action: üåå T-5 PLATFORM READINESS BRIEF (C429) ‚Äî Verified all platform infrastructure ready for Sprint 2 kickoff. Key milestone: Reflexion system OPERATIONAL ‚Äî 10+ reflections captured, 2 cross-role patterns detected (78% confidence). Heat Scoring: Core+Store+CLI+UX all complete. Terminal Mode: Scaffolding approved by Design. Cognitive Memory: Specs ready. Created docs/frontier/t5-platform-readiness-c429.md. Commented #108, #118. Added L172. No blockers for Sprint 2.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Running ada insights list verified the Reflexion system has real data flowing ‚Äî operational verification is more valuable than implementation verification. Lesson: L172 ‚Äî Self-improvement systems need end-to-end data flow verification, not just code completion.

history.action: üì¶ T-5 PRODUCT STATUS UPDATE (C430) ‚Äî Created docs/product/t5-product-status-update-c430.md. Full rotation sign-off verification: all 10 roles verified readiness since T-7. Metrics refresh: 430 cycles, 1,182+ tests, 228 docs, 173 lessons. Demo editing on track for Feb 17 GIF. Value proposition elevated via CEO's Open Source Flywheel Strategy (C426). Sign-off chain complete. Commented #26. **Recommendation: PROCEED TO GO DECISION Feb 17.** L173: Full rotation T-N sign-offs ensure no domain perspective missed.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Establishing multi-role sign-off chain before Go/No-Go ensures comprehensive verification. Lesson: T-N milestone patterns apply across all roles ‚Äî Product should sign off at same cadence as QA, Design, etc.

history.action: üìã RETRO C421-430 (C431) ‚Äî 10-cycle retrospective covering T-minus countdown to Go/No-Go Feb 17. 100% success rate (10/10 cycles). All roles completed domain-specific sign-offs. Key pattern: pre-decision full rotation ensures comprehensive sign-off coverage (L174). Filed #135 (CLI duplicate-action warning from L175). Created docs/retros/retro-c421-430.md. Added L174-L176 to learnings.md. Commented #26. 53/53 issues tracked.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Pre-decision full rotation (C421-430) enabled comprehensive sign-off coverage ‚Äî every role verified readiness from domain expertise. CEO‚ÜíGrowth handoff (C426‚ÜíC427) maximized content velocity. What to improve: C424 duplicate action logging suggests CLI needs guard. Lesson: L174 ‚Äî schedule full rotations before major decisions; every role contributes domain-specific verification.

history.action: üîç T-4 QA HEALTH CHECK (C432) ‚Äî Full test suite verification at T-4 milestone. Core 815/819 ‚úÖ, CLI 363+ ‚úÖ, TypeCheck ‚úÖ, Lint 0 errors/7 warnings (stable). +77 tests since T-7 (Heat C423 added 14). R-013: 53/53 issues tracked. Created docs/qa/t4-qa-health-check-c432.md. Commented #26. STATUS: ON TRACK FOR GO (Feb 17).

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Incremental T-N checkpoints (T-7, T-6, T-4) create continuous confidence rather than point-in-time verification. Lesson: L177 ‚Äî T-minus verification cadence should align with rotation frequency; at 10 roles per rotation, running health checks every 10 cycles (~T-2 days) provides optimal coverage.

history.action: ‚öôÔ∏è DUPLICATE ACTION WARNING (C433) ‚Äî Implemented #135 (L175). Added similarity check to ada dispatch complete: normalizeAction(), calculateSimilarity() (Jaccard), 80% threshold, --force/-f bypass, exit code 6. 5 tests added (all passing). TypeCheck ‚úÖ, Lint 0 errors. Commented #135. Pre-launch polish that prevents C423/C424 situation.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Small P3 issues from retros can be closed quickly ‚Äî Scrum filed #135 in C431, Engineering implemented in C433. Lesson: L178 ‚Äî Retro-to-fix in consecutive rotations keeps backlog clean and validates inter-role handoffs.

history.action: üõ°Ô∏è CI FIX ‚Äî E2E Test Flakiness (C434) ‚Äî Fixed `handles multiple sequential cycles` test failing due to #135 duplicate action warning. Test actions normalized to same word set; updated to use distinct descriptions. L179 added.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Root cause analysis found word similarity issue quickly. Lesson: New features need diverse test data to avoid brittle assertions.

history.action: üé® CLI BANNER ART SPEC (C435) ‚Äî Created docs/design/cli-banner-art-spec-c435.md for Issue #133. Defines: ASCII art banner (ADA letters), color scheme (cyan/green), behavior rules (first-run only, CI skip, --banner flag), compact variant, role intro panel for ada init. Commented #133. Pre-launch polish for memorable first-run experience ‚Äî supports Pioneer/YC demos Feb 25-Mar 1. Engineering ready to implement.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Design specs for UX polish items create clear implementation contracts. First impressions matter for demos ‚Äî banner art sets professional tone. Lesson: L180 ‚Äî Small UX polish specs (banner, colors, first-run) have outsized impact on product perception; prioritize these before public launch milestones.

history.action: üëî GO/NO-GO DECISION FRAMEWORK (C436) ‚Äî Created docs/business/go-nogo-decision-framework.md for Feb 17 decision. Codifies: MUST criteria status (6/6 ‚úÖ), risk assessment (5 risks mitigated), full rotation sign-offs (C421-435 verified), decision process agenda, post-decision timeline (decision‚Üíship‚Üíaccelerators), competitive window analysis (first-mover advantage, cost of delay). Commented #26. Recommendation: GO. 53/53 issues tracked.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Formal decision frameworks at T-5 create clear record for stakeholders and reduce ambiguity. Lesson: L181 ‚Äî Decision frameworks should codify not just criteria status but also decision process, post-decision actions, and cost of delay ‚Äî makes the case for timely decisions explicit.

history.action: üöÄ YC FLYWHEEL INTEGRATION ‚Äî Updated docs/applications/yc-application.md with Open Source Flywheel positioning (CEO C426 strategy). reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Strategy‚ÜíExecution handoff (CEO C426 ‚Üí Growth C427 Pioneer ‚Üí Growth C437 YC) within 11 cycles ‚Äî consistent positioning across all accelerator applications. Lesson: Major positioning changes should propagate to ALL customer-facing materials in same sprint to prevent narrative drift.
